results.title: بمشاركة 9 جهات.. حلول تنسيقية لمعالجة التحديات البيئية بالشرقية
creator: أحمد المسري - الدمام
results.description: عقد مدير عام فرع وزارة البيئة والمياه والزراعة بالمنطقة الشرقية، المهندس فهد الحمزي، اجتماعًا تنسيقيًا موسعًا ضم رؤساء وممثلي تسع جهات رئيسية ضمن منظومة الوزارة بالمنطقة.ويأتي هذا اللقاء بهدف تعزيز كفاءة الأداء ورفع مستوى المواءمة والتكامل بين مختلف الأجهزة العاملة، في قطاعات البيئة والمياه والزراعة.قطاعات البيئة والمياه والزراعةوأوضح المهندس الحمزي أن الهدف الأساسي للاجتماع هو تلافي أي تداخل في الأدوار أو تكرار في الجهود بين فروع الوزارة والجهات المرتبطة بها، بما يضمن توجيه الموارد بالشكل الأمثل.وأضاف أن اللقاء يهدف كذلك إلى تحديد أبرز التحديات والتداخلات القائمة، واقتراح حلول عملية لمعالجتها، مما يحسن من عملية التكامل والمواءمة مع إمارة المنطقة الشرقية. وشدد الحمزي على أن هذه الجهود التنسيقية تصب مباشرة في مصلحة تحقيق المستهدفات الاستراتيجية للوزارة، والتي تنبثق من رؤية المملكة 2030.تقديم خدمات عالية الجودةوأكد أن العمل بروح الفريق الواحد بين جميع جهات المنظومة هو السبيل الأمثل لتقديم خدمات عالية الجودة للمستفيدين، وتجاوز العقبات التي قد تواجه القطاع.وشهد الاجتماع حضورًا رفيع المستوى من مدراء ورؤساء المراكز الوطنية للرقابة على الالتزام البيئي، وتنمية الغطاء النباتي، والأرصاد، والوقاية من الآفات النباتية والأمراض الحيوانية ”وقاء“. كما شارك في اللقاء ممثلون عن شركة المياه الوطنية، والمؤسسة العامة للري، وصندوق التنمية الزراعي، بالإضافة إلى الشركة الوطنية لإمدادات الحبوب ”سابل“ والشركة الوطنية للخدمات الزراعية.

results.title: Prudential launches enhanced "PRUChoice Travel" Insurance Plan to elevate travel experiences with comprehensive protection
results.description: First-in-market coverage for kidnapping and overseas medical expenses for furkids, ensuring customers greater peace of mind while traveling Prudential remains committed to delivering total insurance solutions, ranging from travel to pet insurance, flexibly addressing the evolving protection needs of its customers HONG KONG, June 26, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited ("Prudential") today announced the launch of the upgraded PRUChoice Travel Insurance, which features new protections including coverage for travel interruption due to kidnapping, overseas medical expenses for accompanying furkids, as well as trip cancellation or curtailment resulting from a furkid's injury or illness. This enhanced plan is designed to offer customers more comprehensive travel protection, enabling them to enjoy every journey with greater peace of mind. With public enthusiasm for travel on the rise, emerging trends are reshaping the tourism landscape. A recent travel insurance survey commissioned by Prudential[1] revealed that 31% of respondents plan to embark on three or more trips in 2025. Among pet owners, 45% indicated that ensuring proper care for furkids during their travel is a key consideration. The concept of pet-inclusive traveling is growing with the rise of pet-friendly communities. Hotels, airlines, and travel service providers are upgrading amenities and services to accommodate pets, encouraging more "pawrents" to travel with their furkids. The survey also found that 74% of respondents consider personal safety a major concern when traveling. According to data from Hong Kong government, authorities received 28 requests for assistance from Hong Kong residents detained in Southeast Asian countries[2] between 2023 and January 2025. With growing public awareness around travel safety, comprehensive travel insurance is more essential than ever. Moreover, 43% of respondents identified flight cancellations or delays as one of their top concerns. Michael Han, General Manager of Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited, said: "Hong Kong people's enduring passion for travel has fuelled a growing demand for travel insurance. As market needs continue to evolve, we are committed to leading the way with the launch of the upgraded PRUChoice Travel Insurance, offering market-first protections including kidnapping coverage and overseas furkids medical expenses. Our goal is to offer our customers comprehensive travel protection that ensures a hassle-free journey." The upgraded PRUChoice Travel Insurance offers comprehensive travel protection for customers Prudential has introduced the upgraded PRUChoice Travel Insurance, offering equal personal accident coverage for children, adults and seniors. It also provides protection against trip cancellations caused by unforeseen events happening in Hong Kong and trip destination such as severe weather. In addition, the plan incorporates a range of pioneering coverage features designed to meet the diverse protection needs of customers. Key enhancements include: New features Details Overseas medical support for furkids [First-in-market] Provides coverage of up to HK$10,000 per trip for overseas medical expenses incurred due to illness or bodily injury of the insured person's furkid, when travelling outside Hong Kong together and the furkid is insured under PRUChoice Furkid Care. Trip cancellation and curtailment due to furkid's injury or illness [Rare-in-market] Reimburses irrecoverable travel expenses paid in advance, or (in the event of curtailment) additional accommodation and transportation expenses, if the furkid insured under PRUChoice Furkid Care unfortunately passes away due to bodily injury or illness, or requires surgery or confinement in licensed vet clinic/hospital, resulting in trip cancellation or curtailment. The protection per trip is up to HK$ 30,000 for trip cancellation and HK$ 50,000 for curtailment as a whole. Trip interruption due to kidnapping [First-in-market] In the event of trip curtailment or interruption due to the insured person or travel companion being kidnapped during booked trip, Prudential will reimburse the insured person the irrecoverable loss or additional overseas accommodation and transportation. The protection per trip as a whole for trip curtailment/interruption is up to HK$50,000. Costs and losses incurred due to kidnapping Covers the trauma counseling fee in Hong Kong if the insured person experiences a traumatic event during travel, including kidnapping, terrorist attack, armed robbery, assault, or rape. The maximum coverage per trip is HK$50,000. Through existing coverage, offers protection for medical support, personal accidents, and luggage damage caused by kidnapping during the trip Extension of enrolment and renewal age limit for annual plan [Rare-in-market] The maximum entry and renewal age for annual plan has been increased from 75 to 80. "At Prudential, we listen to and understand our customers' needs, while keeping pace with market trends. This latest product upgrade reflects our ongoing commitment to innovation and our promise to be there when it matters most," added Han. "In 2024, Prudential's general insurance business recorded a remarkable 14% year-on-year increase in overall gross premiums, significantly outpacing the market average growth rate of 5.8%. Notably, our pet insurance business has achieved impressive growth, with first-quarter new premiums surging by 428% compared to the same period last year. Looking ahead, we will continue to refine our product offerings and plan to launch an innovative protection solution centered on pet inclusivity, tailored to meet the evolving needs of our customers. Stay tuned!" For more details about the plan and promotional offers, please refer to the product features and product brochure on Prudential's official website. Click here to download high-resolution images. Prudential launches enhanced “PRUChoice Travel” Insurance” Plan to elevate travel experiences with comprehensive protection. About Prudential Hong Kong Limited Prudential has been serving the people of Hong Kong since 1964. Through Prudential Hong Kong Limited and Prudential General Insurance Hong Kong Limited, we provide a range of financial planning services and products including individual life insurance, investment-linked insurance, retirement solutions, health and medical protection, general insurance, and employee benefits to protect over 1.3 million customers in Hong Kong. In 2023, Prudential established its Macau branch to offer health insurance and financial solutions for the Macau community, completing its footprint in the Greater Bay Area. Please visit www.prudential.com.hk for more information. [1] In February 2025, Prudential commissioned international data analytics firm YouGov to conduct an online survey of 790 respondents in Hong Kong. Respondents were aged 20 and above, with a monthly household income of HK$25,000 or more. The study examined their travel insurance purchasing behaviours and the key factors influencing their decisions [2] Source: news.gov.hk/ (February, 2025) - https://www.news.gov.hk/chi/2025/02/20250212/20250212_140504_539.html
